title: Draft an Employment Agreement
description: An in-house counsel needs to draft a standard employment agreement for a new executive.

tasks.description: Select the company's executive employment agreement template.
Incorporate the specific terms from the offer letter, such as salary, bonus potential, and start date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent customizes the template with the executive's specific deal terms.

tasks.description: Ensure the non-compete and confidentiality clauses are compliant with state law.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies the restrictive covenants are enforceable in the relevant jurisdiction.
